name: Tied Up
description:
Tied Up is a game made in a gamejam.

Two aliens are tied up by a chain and must survive different obstacles and collect soaps. 

The two players are also tied up, they have to play on the same controller. ( This concept was adopted because we all forgot to bring our controllers to the jam !  Still funny :) )

Fun fact, every musics and sound effects are made with mouth sounds! X-C has built instruments will all our voice and composed music with them!

Programmers:  Jean-René Choinière, Maxim Daigle, Marc-Alexandre Monette Molina
2D Artist:            Raphaëlle Dubois
Audio:                   Xavier-Charles Fecteau
